com.mctradepost.building.marketplace.des: A place to turn your unwanted resources into ... something.
com.mctradepost.building.resort.desc: Come relax, have a drink, and let go of some stress.
com.mctradepost.building.recycling.desc: Warehouse full of junk? Turn it into something useful!
mctradepost:shopkeeper.job.desc: Good at capitalism. Bad for the world.
mctradepost:bartender.job.desc: A friend to all, the maker of relaxing concoctions.
mctradepost:guestservices.job.desc: Need a vacation? Service here is the best.
mctradepost:recyclingengineer.job.desc: Get something useful from your junk.
entity.shopkeeper.noitems: The shopkeeper has no items to sell at the marketplace.
entity.shopkeeper.brokenframe: One of the shopkeeper's display frames is broken. Please repair the building.
entity.shopkeeper.noframes: No display frames were found for the shopkeeper to use.
mctradepost.configuration.tradeCoinValue: What is the value of a single trade coin?

mctradepost.configuration.title: MC Trade Post Settings
mctradepost.configuration.baseSelltime.t: How long should the marketplace take to sell items? (in ticks)
mctradepost.configuration.registerSoundC: What is the chance that a cash register will play a sound when an item is sold?
mctradepost.configuration.shoppingChance: What is the percentage chance (per marketplace level) that a visitor will shop at the marketplace?
mctradepost.configuration.marketplace.to: Edit settings for the Marketplace Hut and it's Economic Features.
mctradepost.configuration.resort.tooltip: Edit settings for the Resort Hut and it's features.
mctradepost.configuration.vacationMaxCha: Make vacations more or less likely by adjusting this value up or down.
mctradepost.configuration.maxAdSaturatio: Increase or decrease the time between vacations by adjusting this value up or down.
mctradepost.configuration.vacationSuscep: Skill level under which a citizen is more suceptable to needing a vacation.
mctradepost.configuration.vacationImmuni: Skill level over which a citizen will never need a vacation.
mctradepost.configuration.advertisingCoo: How many ticks must pass between advertising attempts (which may result in vacations)?
mctradepost.configuration.vacationHealin: Skill level increases given by a single vacation.
mctradepost.configuration.recycler.toolt: Edit settings for the Recycling Center and it's features.
mctradepost.configuration.grindersPerLev: How many grinders are available per level of the Recycling Center?
mctradepost.configuration.baseRecyclerTi: How long should the recycler take to process items? (in ticks)
mctradepost.marketplace.nsf: Not enough funds to mint coins.

com.mctradepost.resort.guest.full_invent: A resort guest's inventory is full.
com.mctradepost.recycler.no_input_box: No input box found on the recycling center. Try repairing the building.

com.mctradepost.recycler.no_list_configu: No list of items has been configured for the recycling center.
